text: @DineshDSouza This is stupid. If efforts to reduce the Covid-19 spread succeed, there will be people like Dinesh condemning the success as overreaction. He cannot celebrate saved lives. I do not know why he fails to imagine the millions of deaths had we not stopped the spread.
